mapper.insert: insert into community(cm_bdno,um_no,cm_title,cm_desc) values((select nvl(max(cm_bdno),0)+1 from community), #{um_no}, #{cm_title}, #{cm_desc})
mapper.select:
select * from community where 1 = 1
and cm_title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and cm_desc like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
order by cm_bdno desc
mapper.update: update community set cm_title = #{cm_title}, cm_desc = #{cm_desc} where cm_bdno = #{cm_bdno}
update community set cm_cnt = cm_cnt + 1 where cm_bdno = #{cm_bdno}
